text: Dolphin shorts or Dolfins are a specific style of unisex shorts for athletics. They are typically very short and were originally made from nylon with contrasting binding, side slits, and rounded corners, with a waistband at the topâ€”a style popular in the 1980s. Richard Simmons is iconic for wearing "dolphin shorts" as his trademark. ==References== Category:Trousers and shorts
title: Dolphin shorts
